5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Mahmud b. Labid reported:When 'Uthman b. 'Affan intended to build the mosque (of the Prophet) the people did not approve of it. They liked that it should be kept in the same state. Thereupon he said: I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: He who built a mosque for Allah, Allah would build a house for him like it in Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ بِنَاءِ الْمَسَاجِدِ وَالْحَثِّ عَلَيْهَا
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of building masajid and encouragement to do so
